headline: Is NiSource (NI) Pricing Look Stretched After Recent 12‑Month Share Price Rise?
summary: If you are wondering whether NiSource's current share price lines up with its underlying value, you are not alone, this article is built to help you assess that. NiSource shares recently closed at US$44.03, with returns of 5.9% over the last 30 days and 18.7% over the past year, after a 0.7% decline in the last week. These moves sit alongside ongoing investor attention on US utilities and NiSource's role as a regulated gas and electric provider. In this context, sentiment often reacts to...
